Text: The game works perfectly. Thanks !

Yay! My game is here! As weird as it sounds I am actually excited about this.

Anyways, I am not any average video game company, I am just one man making games for a living, so feel free to give me all your money if you like the game! 

I get it that in some countries PayPal doesn't work, or the price might seem really high for some of you, so here are some gift codes for you:
028D-FEBA-1197

Most of all, enjoy the game, tell your friends about it, and throw some coins in my general direction if you like it!
All the best,
Sos

I have a favour to ask of you! McPixel just landed on Steam Greenlight and it can get on Steam if it gets enough thumbs up!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=91573598

Help me out and experience my eternal love and dryhumping! I'd really appreciate that!
Also, don't forget to give me Rupees, Coins, Gil's or whatever you have few spares of if you enjoy the game! I won't be buying Ferraris for CEOs for that! I'll be buying food and coffee to crunch on making more cool games for you to play!

@samerdl: It is a point-and-click game in which you can interact with various items in each scene. Your goal is to prevent the explosion. Regardless of whether you win or lose, you progress to the next scene. The scenes play in a loop, skipping over previously-solved scenes until all of them have been solved.
